name: blood, trinity, & coin
description: An ongoing 1 to 1 collection undertaken by a solo artist and designer - the main objective of this project is to exercise and explore the depths of his psyche and ever-expanding creativity. With resolve and passion, he hopes to achieve something monumental and forever lasting.

collection_items.name: Xantum Knight
collection_items.description: A knight whose dark past remains shrouded in mystery...

collection_items.name: Saint Panore
collection_items.description: Outer purity masks hidden darkness... A legendary paladin said to have fought demons from the dawn of time...

collection_items.name: Lord Middlemarch
collection_items.description: A commander beloved by his men, but rumors say a darker power fuels his mind...

collection_items.name: Saolee Xuo
collection_items.description: Behind mystery lurks vulnerability, an enigmatic champion whose expressionless face reveals nothing...

collection_items.name: Swordmaster Melody
collection_items.description: Though hailed as liberator, whispers suggest insecurity hides behind this swordmaster's skill...

collection_items.name: Kris the Valiant
collection_items.description: A brave knight bearing a cursed ancestral blade said to steal the souls of fallen foes...

collection_items.name: Young Yustin
collection_items.description: A squire's journey from youthful caution to chivalric bravery, with every lesson etching deeper resolve.

collection_items.name: Quovix the Strong
collection_items.description: A voice for all yet void of warmth, one wonders what shadows spawn such passionless, principled strength...

collection_items.name: Juan the Mystical
collection_items.description: A mage of great power, but whispers in the night question whether knowledge or ego guides his ambitions...

collection_items.name: Knight Jadeakin
collection_items.description: A virtuous knight loyal to the end, or so it seems - what dark forces Manipulate her from the shadows?

collection_items.name: Soldier of Umbria
collection_items.description: Umbria is a land of chaos and brutality... and its Soldier equally so.

collection_items.name: Warmaiden Otsna
collection_items.description: A maiden of war whose every action seems calculated, one wonders what nightmares spawn each calculated step.

collection_items.name: Princess Erani
collection_items.description: A princess celebrated for her kindness.

collection_items.name: Warmaiden Idamee
collection_items.description: A renowned shieldmaiden.

collection_items.name: Lord Michael
collection_items.description: Chaos and strength define this champion.

collection_items.name: Knight Sharlet
collection_items.description: A paladin whose skills and loyalty are beyond question.

collection_items.name: Gloria of Xescarda
collection_items.description: A champion shrouded in mystery - what eldritch powers grant her preternatural skills and prowess?

collection_items.name: Dorrok of Ages
collection_items.description: Stories tell of a demigod’s wrath and glory - his true nature remains a mystery to all but a hidden cabal.

collection_items.name: Lord Anthony
collection_items.description: A noble commander whose ambitions are whispered to surpass all mortal men, what unholy pact fuels his drive for domination?

collection_items.name: Countess Danielle
collection_items.description: A leader whose charisma inspires all but even so - dark whispers hint at nameless sacrileges of her shadowed past.

collection_items.name: Kathera of Imor
collection_items.description: Though praised for courage, something in her eyes hints at storms within, and trials not yet faced.

collection_items.name: Ressna of Shadows
collection_items.description: Beauty and skill define this rogue.

collection_items.name: Captain Laeowitch
collection_items.description: A captain cloaked - prowess proves power yet purpose perspires darkness.

collection_items.name: Itoria of Iuonia
collection_items.description: A warrior of moonlight - mystery masks a secret mission.

collection_items.name: Natell of Aumbsu
collection_items.description: A cunning infiltrator whose skills seem too sharp to be mundane - what sinister patrons grant sponser?

collection_items.name: Merc Velno
collection_items.description: A sellsword whose prowess inspires allies and terrifies foes.

collection_items.name: Dawnseer Orenna
collection_items.description: A mystic whose foresight and incantations can turn the tide of battle.

collection_items.name: Cragnok
collection_items.description: A primordial monster...

collection_items.name: Simon of Estenworth
collection_items.description: A stoic knight bearing arms against the dark... the void in his eyes betrays nameless horrors that still consume his soul.

collection_items.name: Rogue Gnona
collection_items.description: A mage who escaped from captivity... her magic carries the scent of curiosity and madness.

collection_items.name: Scalefin
collection_items.description: A serpentine abomination said to herald a nameless King beneath the waves.

collection_items.name: Lord Fennar
collection_items.description: A noble whose court masks schemes whispered to enrich a dark cult beneath shining spires.

collection_items.name: Geusma the Runeknight
collection_items.description: A knight without light - a tool of terror that triumphs lofty ambitions.

collection_items.name: Lady Heskiema
collection_items.description: A regal sorceress whose beauty hides ruthless cunning.

collection_items.name: Merc Corvek
collection_items.description: A veteran mercenary, his sorrow burns behind eyes that have seen too much.

collection_items.name: Sinhunter Prista
collection_items.description: A paladin sinhunter, a title given to appease a dark obsession.

collection_items.name: Lord Payne
collection_items.description: A crimson warlord, uniting allies through fear and brutality.

collection_items.name: Paladin Ntorri
collection_items.description: A virtuous guardian, a fanatic whose wrath would see all unbelievers perish.

collection_items.name: Safari of Hunt
collection_items.description: A proud monster hunter.

collection_items.name: Dwafthunter Eleejinn
collection_items.description: A warrior from one of the last tribes of Lizardmen.

collection_items.name: Darklight Torgomo
collection_items.description: A mysterious hybrid abomination, the first of a new blasphemous race whose emergence may mark the return of an ancient power...

collection_items.name: Syiann the Forsaken
collection_items.description: An exiled thief whose skills could dismantle nations.

collection_items.name: Naidea the Gambit
collection_items.description: A warrior who weaves the fabric of fate - time flows to the questions that remain for her standing.

collection_items.name: Dwarven Raider
collection_items.description: Dwarven folk are regarded throughout the lands as extremely violent and sadistic... be warned...

collection_items.name: Countess Minia
collection_items.description: A regal mystic guiding allies to glory through incantations older than names.

collection_items.name: Winstin
collection_items.description: Legacy bides behind bladesong, what ambitions hone such hitwork?

collection_items.name: Yuvanna
collection_items.description: A stalwart Soldier shielding hope against all darkness, or a flesh puppet enacting an inhuman plot?

collection_items.name: Battlemage Esteray
collection_items.description: A prodigious mage wielding sorcery like steel.

collection_items.name: Antonius of Renown
collection_items.description: A renowned sage educating and instilling wisdom in a new generation of mages.

collection_items.name: Battlemage Delamay
collection_items.description: Power corrupts, as this mage knows - but confronting shadows demands confronting one's place among them.

collection_items.name: Justicar Gavin
collection_items.description: An honorable enforcer upholding royal justice.

collection_items.name: Methus Kale
collection_items.description: A great hero defending the innocent against evil.

collection_items.name: Wanderer Yaska
collection_items.description: A nomad warrior exploring and traveling through the land.

collection_items.name: Ivonis
collection_items.description: A legendary champion whose triumphs echo throughout the land.

collection_items.name: Guinaveen
collection_items.description: A guardian whose shield seems to be as breakless as her indomitable will.

collection_items.name: Scout Linfey
collection_items.description: A swift infiltrator preserving allies through stealth and skill.

collection_items.name: Navigator Salean
collection_items.description: A cunning guide navigating harsh air currents towards fortune.

collection_items.name: Zerra
collection_items.description: A daring knight exploring mysteries and unanswered questions at swordpoint.

collection_items.name: Narlsa
collection_items.description: A fierce warrior who embraces her predatory spirit in battle.

collection_items.name: Merc Jasmin
collection_items.description: A battle-hardened sellsword fighting for coin and glory.

collection_items.name: Knight Jakarde
collection_items.description: An evasive knight who turns foes' strength against them.

collection_items.name: Headhunter Zelfua
collection_items.description: A formidable sorceress with unknown motivations.

collection_items.name: Velna
collection_items.description: A virtuous rogue whose skill equals her discretion.

collection_items.name: Captain Rainy
collection_items.description: A captain defending the kingdom through strength, skill, and loyalty.

collection_items.name: Lagartha
collection_items.description: A deceptive warrior who exploits guile as readily as steel.

collection_items.name: Captain Qesse
collection_items.description: An aggressive soldier commanding through fury and fear.

collection_items.name: Lady Brene
collection_items.description: An eccentric mystic guided by ancient incantations.

collection_items.name: Merc Blair
collection_items.description: A cautious fighter navigating war's tides with care.

collection_items.name: Lady Loria
collection_items.description: A tactful sorceress subtly guiding events through magic's weave.

collection_items.name: Militant Armen
collection_items.description: A swift soldier dancing between foes' blows.

collection_items.name: Trader Xuenfet
collection_items.description: An exotic mage practicing strange foreign magics.

collection_items.name: Paladin Vance
collection_items.description: A stalwart sentinel devoted to shielding the innocent.

collection_items.name: Ailifona
collection_items.description: A steadfast guardian faithfully upholding her vows.

collection_items.name: Commander Ismosic
collection_items.description: A barbarous warlord dominating all in his path.

collection_items.name: Lady Geusma
collection_items.description: A noble mystic pursuing hidden knowledge.

collection_items.name: Countess Vivian
collection_items.description: An aggressive sorceress hungry for power and riches.

collection_items.name: Countess Ivona
collection_items.description: A ruthless noble using guile and betrayal in pursuit of power.

collection_items.name: Lautia of Umbria
collection_items.description: A cunning warrior from a land of chaos and deceit.

collection_items.name: Headhunter Deshna
collection_items.description: A ruthless monster hunter stalking creatures in darkness.

collection_items.name: Demigod Evermoore
collection_items.description: An ancient hero whose triumphs become legend.

collection_items.name: Vaulta Redblade
collection_items.description: An exotic thief who plunders riches through sorcery and guile.

collection_items.name: Demigod Gladmoore
collection_items.description: An ancient armored champion of mythic strength.

collection_items.name: Enchantress Monika
collection_items.description: A mystical battlemage bending magical currents to her will.

collection_items.name: Geralt of Mecil
collection_items.description: A wrathful warrior who crushes foes with relentless force.

collection_items.name: Veteran Frano
collection_items.description: A cautious knight who carefully measures each strike in battle.

collection_items.name: Milady Vixen
collection_items.description: A cunning rogue who exploits guile to claim riches and power.

collection_items.name: Merc Isodore
collection_items.description: A worldly fighter employing exotic foreign techniques in battle.

collection_items.name: Ira Spellsword
collection_items.description: A tactical spellblade combining sorcery and steel.

collection_items.name: Militant Kalmo
collection_items.description: A deceitful soldier who uses trickery to triumph in war.

collection_items.name: Wendi of Descarda
collection_items.description: A methodical warrior meditating upon each movement in combat.

collection_items.name: Veteran Roland
collection_items.description: A skilled archer who evades foes while raining lethal arrows.

collection_items.name: Naga Warrior
collection_items.description: A mystical serpentine fighter defending ancient ruins.

collection_items.name: Enchanter Mistra
collection_items.description: An occult sorcerer weaving ancient spells to sway war's tides.

collection_items.name: Veteran Zezima
collection_items.description: A barbarous warrior relying on fury and power to crush enemies.

collection_items.name: Veteran Gregor
collection_items.description: A stalwart soldier weathering all trials with shield and faith.

collection_items.name: Epharie of Twilight
collection_items.description: A tactical warrior using the shadows as a cloak and weapon.

collection_items.name: Tailiya Songsword
collection_items.description: An exotic dervish wielding blade and dance in hypnotic harmony.

collection_items.name: Young Stella
collection_items.description: A gentle-hearted royal pursuing kindness rather than power.

collection_items.name: Pathfinder Velmont
collection_items.description: A questing knight exploring the world's mysteries and secrets.

collection_items.name: Countess Cassia
collection_items.description: An eccentric mystic blending spell and steel in an unorthodox style.

collection_items.name: Delva
collection_items.description: A stalwart soldier whose shield protects the innocent from all shadow.

collection_items.name: Lyandra
collection_items.description: A cunning rogue who strikes from the darkness before foes detect her presence.

collection_items.name: Liora
collection_items.description: A steadfast knight wielding ancient magics to smite evil forces.

collection_items.name: Iron Knight
collection_items.description: Iron Knight's are unyielding champions whose heavy plate turns aside most blows.

collection_items.name: Battlemage Fayin
collection_items.description: A wrathful sorcerer channeling chaotic energies against all those who oppose him.

collection_items.name: Nyxaril
collection_items.description: An elegant warrior whose graceful bladework conceals masterful skill.

collection_items.name: Dravolo
collection_items.description: A fearsome knight whose massive axe cleaves foes in a storm of gore.

collection_items.name: Zhorvax
collection_items.description: An occult magus communing with eldritch powers beyond mortal reckoning.

collection_items.name: Blue Knight
collection_items.description: A virtuous knight upholding honor with shield, sword, and unbreakable will.

collection_items.name: Corvexia
collection_items.description: A cunning skirmisher maneuvering foes into vulnerable positions for the kill.

collection_items.name: Yonelee
collection_items.description: A vigilant guardian patiently awaiting the perfect moment to counterattack.

collection_items.name: Vyndrae
collection_items.description: A swift warrior evading all blows while pursuing lethal strikes.

collection_items.name: Bronze Knight
collection_items.description: Bronze Knight's are methodical crusaders dismantling enemies with heavy mace swings.

collection_items.name: Enchanted Knight
collection_items.description: Enchanted Knight's are empowered by ancient magics to smite enemy forces.

collection_items.name: Nyxarila
collection_items.description: A ruthless champion exploiting guile and brutality to crush enemies and ambitions alike.

collection_items.name: Dancer Eaxomi
collection_items.description: A graceful dervish employing hypnotic dance and daggers in perfect synchronicity.

collection_items.name: Battlemage Wynvul
collection_items.description: A tactical spellcaster subtly shaping battles through occult manipulations.

collection_items.name: Brystan
collection_items.description: A cunning rogue adept at exploitation and deception in pursuit of wealth.

collection_items.name: Tyrvan
collection_items.description: A rampaging warrior-berserker overwhelming foes through sheer fury.

collection_items.name: Fiona
collection_items.description: Fiona is a royal mage whose mastery over the arcane arts is whispered to be unrivaled.
